mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAFE(cafe_id, user_id, cafe_name, biz_number, tel, address_code, address_detail, operating_time, cafe_info, social_media, registration_date, update_date, wifi, reservation, parking_space, no_kids_zone, with_pet, cafe_condition, cafe_registration) VALUES (#{cafeId}, #{userId}, #{cafeName}, #{bizNumber}, #{tel}, #{addressCode}, #{addressDetail}, #{operatingTime}, #{cafeInfo}, #{socialMedia}, now(), now(), #{wifi}, #{reservation}, #{parkingSpace}, #{noKidsZone}, #{withPet}, #{cafeCondition}, #{cafeRegistration})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT cafe_name FROM cafe WHERE cafe_id = #{cafeId} AND user_id = #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE cafe SET cafe_name = #{cafeName}, tel = #{tel}, address_code = #{addressCode}, address_detail = #{addressDetail}, operating_time = #{operatingTime}, cafe_info = #{cafeInfo}, social_media = #{socialMedia}, update_date = now(), wifi = #{wifi}, reservation = #{reservation}, parking_space = #{parkingSpace}, no_kids_zone = #{noKidsZone}, with_pet = #{withPet} WHERE cafe_id = #{cafeId}
